description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8kkn5","text":"DNA was extracted from lake sediment samples by an alkaline lysis method with ethanol precipitation adapted from method described by Kuwae et al. (2020); Sakata et al. (2020b); Sakata et al. (2020a). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ap7mm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"daur1","text":"In a comparison of multiple sedDNA extraction methods, the ABPS (Alkaline buffer - power soil) protocol yielded the highest concentrations of target genets across a range of lake sediments. This protocol was further optimized (65C incubation temperature, pooling of multiple PowerSoil extractions) to overcome technical challenges related to co-precipitation of organic content in lake-surface sediments.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9sth","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"99uph","text":"The optimized ABPS protocol is called the \"Lakes ABPS protocol\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92n2b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hmbm","text":"This protocol has proven to be successful at detecting fish sedDNA from surface sediments in multiple systems for multiple species.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
protocol_references: {"blocks":[{"key":"1rhsc","text":"Thomson-Laing, G.,Howarth, J. D.,Vandergoes, M. J., \u0026Wood, S. A.(2022).Optimised protocol for the extraction of fish DNA from freshwater sediments.Freshwater Biology,67,1584–1603.https://doi.org/10.1111/fwb.13962","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":147,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":179,"length":33}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5D8C6875DD3511ED8E850A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://doi.org/10.1111/fwb.13962"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7n85u","text":"INTO a 50 mL tube add:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ecg8","text":"  of sediment sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"84g80","text":"  sodium hydroxide (0.33M)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"drl8i","text":"  Tris-EDTA (pH 8)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"1E06B4E0DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"2999CF90DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"3","error":false,"guid":"40725A20DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f52kt","text":"ALLOW samples to cool to   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"31n2p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cicr","text":"CENTRIFUGE at   for   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":14,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":20,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"84EF2890DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15000","error":false,"guid":"8BA72110DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2433}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"92D44990DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9r6rp","text":"TRANSFER   of supernatant to a new 50 mL tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9eh9q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tnhk","text":"ADD   of Tris HCl (1M, pH 6.7) to neutralize","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7.5","error":false,"guid":"E7B43150DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7.5","error":false,"guid":"FA63F9C0DD3311EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ckl8c","text":"ADD   sodium acetate (3M, pH 5.2)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4u3gd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"am2ip","text":"ADD   of molecular grade 100% ethanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fm080","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"33i3v","text":"INCUBATE samples at   for \u003c  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"16F7F460DD3411EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"30","error":false,"guid":"2492C5F0DD3411EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"3442BBE0DD3411EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"3921AEA0DD3411EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1uvs6","text":"EXTRACT the total pellet using multiple DNeasy PowerSoil DNA Isolation Kit extractions following the manufacturer's instructions","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":7},{"style":"bold","offset":87,"length":41}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2p3tf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4vao","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a9nq","text":"POOL resultant DNA elutes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7a9np","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"uedv","text":"DNA is now ready for downstream applications","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5p2nc","text":"  of pellet per extraction","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"amount":"0.25-0.5","error":false,"guid":"9FB04280DD3411EDA7EFE59B5C2416D1","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":6},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"amount"}}}}}}
